name: Hamster Energy Co
description:
As a new employee of Hamster Energy Co, manage a hamster-powered phone charging station. Keep your hamsters happy and grow the business!

Created for GoGodotJam 2 with the theme "Energy Source".

Download desktop version for best experience.

Controls

Click on objects and buttons to interact.

Credits

Jetpackgone - programmer, artist, sound designer

Special thanks to Will for testing.

Third party assets

  • Font: "Grand9K Pixel Font" by Jayvee D. Enaguas (Grand Chaos)
  • Music: "Bossa Nova" by Joth
Tools
  • Godot v3.4.0
  • Krita v4.4.1
  • LMMS v1.2.0
  • Audacity v2.1.2
